I understand why it was sold for a cheap price. I brought this outfit to wear to the airport and I looked down to the end of the sleeve and found that the thread had unraveled on both of them in the cuff which left a large size hole. Then I washed the pants and noticed light coming through in the buttocks of the pants, which were 2 small holes. I must mention that I am 5’ 1” tall and I found the length barely touched the top of my sneakers. I think there’s a lot of incorrect sizing going on. Some say it’s too long, too short or just right, which is crazy. I’m thoroughly disappointed in this purchase and would not recommend it to anyone.

5’9” 137lbs 40-31-38 tall & thin. Ordered the blue, size small. Very nice color. Decent stretch. Medium weight fabric. Arms are too short which makes thumb holes unusable. Wide waistband on the zip top gives a figure flattering look, though the zipper isn’t effortless, it gets stuck... Well sewn stretch waistband with drawstring, seams down from waistband to bottom of pant in back and front. According to the size chart, size small pants are at least 40” long. Mine measured 38“. I really need a 41” pant to be able to wear with flats and have it fit me right. Took a chance on these though but didn’t work out for me, unfortunately. 🤷🏻‍♀️ Other than sleeves and pants being very short, the fit was pretty perfect in shoulders waist hips and butt. Fabric is just okay. Don’t love it...Fast fashion. 65%Polyester 30%Cotton 5%Elastane. Really wanted this one to work but another NO. Will return. Hope this is helpful as I’m always looking for height and weight and measurements in reviews to help make purchasing decisions easier. 😉

Otherwise I am very Happy - I'll have to RETURN the Black one & hopefully they will get me the Pants that are longer. They look the same - but the packaging was a little different & the BLACK one came one day sooner - so I don't know if they came from different locations.

评论概述: From my experience the pants run large.
评论详情: Not as cute as the picture. I sew…so I recognize quality stitching. Though the large pants were too big isn’t the only issue. I won’t order again because the stitching does not allow for the gatherings at the waist to lay down in a flattering way, they make you look 10 lbs heavier because they poke out. Overall the trendy look was a good idea but the execution or making didn’t accomplish a flattering look.
This outfit fits great and is good quality. The pants are a little long. I just ordered the one in black.
Wear it half dozen times the color is fading already. Otherwise I really like the material and how it looks.
This was a great surprise. it fits perfect and fir is true to size. I have gotten compliments and where did I buy this and I have worn this twice. I will be buying another color.

I am 5’5.5”, 220 40L I carry most of my weight in my midsection. I had not expected this to fit or be so soft. I’m so glad I was wrong. I can tell this Weill continue to fit as I lose weight too. It makes me look like I have a waist! It is also warm without being too warm. I can’t believe I look so cute in joggers and a hoodie! I also love the hood. I am very photo sensitive and I wear the hood up to keep the sun off my face and use my hair to cover my upper neck. I also adore the thumb holes. I can tell this is not only going to be a morning walk staple, but also used for when ever I need good range of motion and to look good doing what ever the heck I want to to.  The price is so low for the quality. I’m a bit shocked that it is soft, breathable and durable. I have been using it daily for a week on workout and the inner thighs have not pilled. I even did yoga and 1 mile of waking a day. Yeah… I just placed an order for 2 more! I’m also tempted to buy the next size down for when I need it, but realized that’s what the working drawstring and stretchy waist is for. I will still buy more when I need to, but I don’t have to panic waiting for a few days as the new ones come in so I can be comfy and confident gain.. (I got off meds that made me gain 20 lb in 3 months. I’m already dropping the weight without trying.)  My ONLY negative is that the zipper is rough. If I’m not careful my thin nails break on it while zipping and it’s not smooth when you pull up the zipper. But I just take a little extra care when zipping up and it so far has not caught on my fine long hair or my delicate mesh workout tops. So I’m happy and it did not deter me from buying 2 more.
135lbs, 5’ 1” A cup with a big butt and the answer is nope.  Not the worst fast fashion material but it is what it is.
Good quality, fits well !

评论概述: Cute set but NOT tall girl friendly!
评论详情: I’m about 5’10 and these pants fit perfectly in the waist and hips but the inseam of these pants come up a wee bit short for my liking. The top was so freaking cute but it was a bit loose in the waist and not as figure hugging as I was expecting. Ended up returning because of the pants but if you’re a shorter girlie, you’ll prolly love it!

WOW!!!!  This is my second set and haven't worn the first one yet!! Ordered in white and after arrival, I was so excited I ordered the light gray. Depending on lighting, could appear lilac (purplish) which you can see in the ad photo. Now, when I say "Game Changer " , this company has set the bar!!!  Quality, zipper, color, fit,length and overall all style is 💯 and not generic looking. It does come in a vacuum sealed bag that's delivered in a Amazon package. So it was very wrinkled but that didn't bother me.(steaming can take care of that)!I'm planning to wear them both dressy casual with heels going out for dinner and casually pulled together running errands. This is a vendor that I’m sure to check out more of their clothing!!So based on Amazon recommendation Xl would best fit me. After reading description said "relaxed fit " and looking at size chart, I went with size lg and I'm happy that I did!! I'm 5'8 ,40DD, average built and carry  some weight in midsection. The fabric has "give " and should fit somewhat loose but not snugg. Can be worn now  and though early  summer. Also with proper undergarment the light colors aren't a issue for me.Hope this review is helpful for someone.
Fits true to size, I’m about 130-135lbs normally I would be a small but I  just had a baby and I’m breastfeeding so I’m on the busty side and a medium fit perfect. The color was as pictured.
It's a wonderful outfit. I purchased it on sale and the price was worth it. I just am not yet close to my target weight. I returned it and want to purchase at a later date.

Wore this outfit all day yesterday and I want another one. It’s so stylish and comfortable, and I like how the fitted top slims my midsection. The fabric is soft and cool, a good weight for fall/winter in Florida. I was worried that the top’s fitted waist might ride up, but it doesn’t. Pants length is perfect (I’m 5’7” with long legs). The color is a soft, cool periwinkle blue - very flattering with my gray hair. I will probably order another color also, but I will wait until I put this one through the laundry. Hope it doesn’t shrink or fade. (If it doesn’t laundrrcwell, I will update this review.)

This is a very stylish mid-weight sweatsuit. Nice high waist, pleated details. Great for lazy weekends out. I am 5'6" and 137lbs. Bought the medium. Perfect length for my height and  with a little platform sneaker. Comfortable on the waistline with a little extra room in the midsection. If you're shorter than 5 ft 4 in it will be pretty long. I think it will be an ideal length for someone five five to five seven
